value:
$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|Aww... Of course, just as we were
about to get to enjoying ourselves
at the Winter Festival!$k$pWell, we can't just stand by and
watch as this vortex ruins our fun!
...Right, Jaffar?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_WinterFes19,Face|I...can't say I care either way.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|O-oh... Really? Well, it makes me
kinda sad...$k$pI just really wanted to see all the
pretty festival sights together with
you, Jaffar...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_WinterFes19,Face|The festival...does not interest me.
But if the vortex is keeping you from
enjoying yourself, I'll take care of it.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|Oh, Jaffar, you will? Thank you!$k$pH-hey, wait! Slow down, Jaffar!
You're walking too fast!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_WinterFes19,Face|Hmm... I suppose this means I ought
to come along as well. Seems a bit
of a fool's errand otherwise...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭若ゼフィール,ch03_25_Zefhyr_M_WinterFes19,Face|Now, now...this is an opportunity!
You, O great progenitor god, have
the chance to display your power.$k$pI for one would delight to study
your battle prowess, that I might
glean new skills from doing so.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_WinterFes19,Face|Hmph. Watch if you like. But you
needn't supply me with any more
reason to fight.$k$pThat girl was not the only one keen
on enjoying the festival, after all...
Now then...let us begin!$k$p

$WmMPID_冬祭ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_WinterFes19,Face|It seems we've run out of enemies.
The vortex must have dissipated.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_WinterFes19,Face|Hmph. It was nothing.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|Sothis! That was...amazing! You're
so incredibly strong...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_WinterFes19,Face|Oh, you're a sweet little girl, aren't
you! Feel free to praise me as much
as you please.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|Wait—"little girl"? Aren't we...around
the same age? I, uh... Hm.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭若ゼフィール,ch03_25_Zefhyr_M_WinterFes19,Face|Ah! Look. The town is aglow once
more. The festival must have
resumed. Shall we return?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_WinterFes19,Face|Now we can enjoy the festival,
right?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|Yes, let's! After all that fighting, I bet
we could all use a bite to eat!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭若ゼフィール,ch03_25_Zefhyr_M_WinterFes19,Face|Eating commoner fare from a festival
stand... Is such an act permissible
for the Prince of Bern? I wonder...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ソティス,ch17_05_Sothis_F_WinterFes19,Face|Do not overthink it. Even the greatest
among you is little more than one of
the masses next to a god...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ニノ,ch03_03_Nino_F_WinterFes19,Face|Enough talking about it. I'm getting
hungrier by the second! Let's get
going, Jaffar!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_WinterFes19,Face|...Right.$k$p
